title: Saliva Chicken
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - ¼ tsp Ground Roasted Sichuan Pepper
directions: 1. In a medium pot over high heat, bring about 4 inches of water to a boil. Add chicken, Shaoxing wine, ginger slices, and scallions. Lower heat to medium and simmer for about 20 minutes until chicken is tender and cooked through.2. While the chicken cooks, make the sauce: In a bowl, combine Zhong Sauce, chicken stock, black vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and Sichuan pepper. Mix thoroughly.3. Prepare an ice bath.4. Once chicken is done, transfer it to the ice bath to cool for about 15 minutes. Remove and chop into ¼-inch chunks.5. Arrange chicken on a serving plate and pour sauce over the top. Garnish with sesame seeds, sliced scallion greens, cilantro, and chili oil to taste.
